channel.title: Abouts on this'n'that
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on this'n'that

item.title: About
item.description:
Well hello there!

This page is just another blog, that may or may not get forgotten over time.

As the title suggests it will contain posts from this and that. Main topic will always be IT related.

item.title: $ who
item.description:
Who am I?

I’m Szabi (prn. ˈsɒbi) for short. A engineering manager and software developer.

In 2014 I’ve had the luck to join a french start-up company as a jnr. JavaScript/nodejs programmer. It has been an intense start with the company, new domain and technologies. But luckily I’ve enjoyed learning it all, so managed to stick with them since. As the company grown I also got the chance to grow in both as a programmer and later as a lead, then engineering manager and now as a director of engineering.

Really enjoy both participating and leading discussions about technical challenges that our teams encounter. Like to discover both the hacky and the idealistic solutions and their pros and cons.

Apart from work I really like to cycle and attend organized bike tours with my family.

You can find up-to-date information about me, on my linkedin profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/szabszilagyi/
